description: This file is a CMake configuration script that sets up a JSON generator and documentation generator related to a software project. It defines functions for invoking a Python-based JSON generation tool and generating documentation, handling various command-line options and path configurations.
external_files: CMake modules and external tools invoked via execute_process (implicitly external Python scripts and CMake modules)

methods.name: JsonGenerator
methods.description: Function to configure and run the JSON generator Python script with specified options and input files.

methods.name: DocGenerator
methods.description: Function to generate documentation by invoking the JsonGenerator function with parameters related to a specific plugin JSON file.
